function.name: get_eef_pos
function.description: Get the current end effector position of the robot in its own frame in the scheme [x,y,z] in meters

function.name: get_eef_rot
function.description: Get the current end effector rotation of the robot in its own frame as an euler rotation in the scheme [x,y,z]

function.name: resolve_object_from_name
function.description: Get the current position of a simulated object 'pos' and rotation 'rot' as a dict

object_name.description: The name of the object to resolve

function.name: open_gripper
function.description: Opens the gripper of the robot

function.name: close_gripper
function.description: Closes the gripper of the robot

function.name: move_abs
function.description: Moves to the specified absolute position relative to the robot frame

x.description: The x coordinate of the position to move to in meters

y.description: The y coordinate of the position to move to in meters

z.description: The z coordinate of the position to move to in meters

function.name: grip_object
function.description: Opens the gripper, moves the gripper to the object with the given name, then closes the gripper

object_name.description: The name of the object to be picked

function.name: press_button
function.description: Presses the button of the microwave

function.name: open_door
function.description: Opens the door of the microwave

function.name: close_door
function.description: Closes the door of the microwave

function.name: place_object_at_destination
function.description: Opens the gripper and drops the object on ground, optionally at destination

object_name.description: The name of the object to be placed

destination_name.description: The name of the destination where the object should placed

height_offset.description: The height offset from where to drop the object above the destination in meters

front_offset.description: The offset in the x direction from where to drop the object before/after the destination in meters

function.name: approach_destination_from_direction
function.description: Move along every axis except for the given direction, then fully move to destination. Uses coordinates relative to the robot frame

destination.description: The coordinates of the destination in the format [x, y, z] in meters

direction.description: The direction in which to move last
